coded_answer.p: I recientlyrecently was in London, staying in my sister's home, and I went to sesee "Over the Rainbow". I had a lotslot of problems and I would like to tell you about them.

Early that day I went to buy the tickets and I decided to buy the expensive ones, likeas the promotion paper said they madegave discounts to people thatwho worked at the British Institute. I mentioned it, but they told me that the promotion had ended a long time ago. Why do you put it onin the paper then? In the evening I got a flat tire, and because of this I got late to the showto the show late, when I got to my placeseat, it was usedtaken (it cost a lot) and they took me to the cheapest seats, where I couldn't see a thing. After waiting a while in this uncomfortable placeseat the show started,. I waited 45 minutes and then the actors appeared, but I findfounddiscovered myself that the main one wasn't Danny Brook, it was an impostor.

And finally when the show ended I decided to go and eat something, but the restaurant was closed because the chef was sick. Sorry, but all these stuff are notnone of this is proffesionalprofessional, and I am going to make a demand exactly because you don't have that, if you don't give me my money back.
Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets.

Yesterday I decided to go to the "blue disco" because the guy I liked was going to be there. But there was a little problem and it was that my parent'sparents didn't let me go alone to disco'sdiscosto discos alone, so I had to go illegalyillegally, and I decided I would do it.

That night I waited until my parents were asleep and I wentclimbed out of my window. I had told Pat to pick me up, she. She was the only one thatwho newknew my plan. I made her promise she wouldn't tell anyone my secret. So when we arrived toat the disco there was my guy waiting for me. To sumarizesummarise the night, I am going steady with him, and he took me home. The next morning Pat came to my house,. I was sleeping so she talked to my mom and she suddenly asked her: At what time did Catana arrive home last night?...
All the truth was then told, and now I am growndedgrounded for life. She defintevelydefinitely doesn't know how to keep secrets.
